parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Full path and filename to which to save the table template file (see Remarks )

title: ITableAnnotation.SaveAsTemplate
description: Saves the format of this table as a template file, which you can then use to create other tables of the same type and that look the same.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Full path and filename to which to save the table template file (see Remarks )

returns: True if the table is saved as a template file, false if not
remarks:
You must specify a filename. It should include the path, filename, and filename extension to which to save the table as a template file.
If a file of the specified name in the specified path...
Then it is...
Exists
Overwritten
Does not exist
Created
The filename extension of the file does not matter, but to be consistent with the SOLIDWORKS naming conventions, the following extensions should be used:
.
sldbomtbt
for BOM tables
.
sldrevtbt
for revision tables
.
sldholtbt
for hole tables
.
sldtbt
for general tables
